plot outline: The title is not just a slang word but a hip new attitude, importantly a fresh perspective on life. A coming-of-age comedy about a 33-year-old who is trapped between the identity of a boy and a man. YZ tells the story of Gajanan, who ends up in Pune, and how his friendship with an 18-year-old called Battees, opens him up to a new world around him. When the most under confident person in the world meets the most confident one, a series of maddening events is bound to happen. YZ is an incredible journey of friendship, innocence, happiness, love, true spice of life and the beauty within. YZ is all about discovering our own real, mad and bold YZ version. So, break free and be YZ!
title: YZ
plot: The title is not just a slang word but a hip new attitude, importantly a fresh perspective on life. _YZ_ (qv) is a coming-of-age comedy about a 33-year-old who is trapped between the identity of a boy and a man.

The title is not just a slang word but a hip new attitude, importantly a fresh perspective on life. A coming-of-age comedy about a 33-year-old who is trapped between the identity of a boy and a man. _YZ_ (qv) tells the story of Gajanan, who ends up in Pune, and how his friendship with an 18-year-old called Battees, opens him up to a new world around him. When the most under confident person in the world meets the most confident one, a series of maddening events is bound to happen. _YZ_ (qv) is an incredible journey of friendship, innocence, happiness, love, true spice of life and the beauty within. _YZ_ (qv) is all about discovering our own real, mad and bold _YZ_ (qv) version. So, break free and be _YZ_ (qv)!

Gajanan a 33 year old virgin is a History professor whose soon to be married and shy to talk to girls.As a temporary lecturer in Pune meets a 18 year old Battees who gains confidence in Gajanan's aunt arranges his marriage with Pranarekha and both meet each other but he feels she is not his type as she is devotional.He meets Antra friend of his cousin Aarti and develops a feeling for her which he never experienced.But soon comes across Sayali his childhood love whose now a single mother and decides to share his feelings.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
